about_the_game:
Notice: The content of this game was made entirely by me alone. I am Chinese and my English is not considered too good. The English version of this game was translated by me using a translation program and proofread by myself, so it may not be in line with everyday language. Also, there are still some flaws in the optimization of the localization of the framework, which makes it take longer to start the game or read the advance in English than in Chinese.

There is a mobile apk in the installation directory, it supports android, ios I haven't tried it, it shouldn't work ......

All four female protagonists in this game can be cheated, and each has a True Ending. On top of that, there are tons of other endings in this game. Normal and bad endings may also include some relevant information about this world, and also, it may be that in some people's eyes, a normal ending may not be worse than a true ending, so please explore on your own.

This is a relationship adventure story about revolution ......

After centuries of war and annexation, the world is gradually dominated by two great powers, the Oakley Empire and the Alton Federation. They honored different ideologies and viewed each other as arch-enemies. Four years ago, a world war broke out between these two powers and their allies. In the end, after millions of deaths and injuries, an unconditional peace was reached between the two defeated sides a few weeks ago. Though there appears to have been no significant territorial changes, at least within the empire, there are a number of aspirants who are ready for a revolution. The country seems to be at the crossroads of change.

The protagonist, Yang Che: a veteran who came from the East but fought through the four-year war in the Imperial Army, was assigned to the Imperial Royal First Academy as a military teacher after the war. However, he comes to this academy with one purpose in mind - to kill the Emperor.

Zoe von Lundhall:

the princess of the Empire, a pampered and naive young girl who has been isolated from the dark side of the Empire since childhood. Although her life is like a caged bird, she has always longed for the scenery outside the cage, even if it is very dangerous. After meeting Yang Che in the academy, Zoe believed that Yang Che would be able to bring herself out of the cage she grew up in. But what she doesn't know is that Yang Che's goal is to kill her beloved father.

Wang Li:

Same Easterner as Yang Che, but his real identity is an agent of the Federation. During the war, Yang Che had entered into a partnership with Wang Li, who was an enemy, and the agent organization behind her, and this partnership was maintained until after the war in order to assassinate the Emperor. It's just that for Wang Li, she may want more than just a partnership.

Kreya Kahn:

The current leader of the Red Shirts, the Empire's resistance organization. Her brother, Marco Kahn, was killed in action before the end of the war due to a clash with the Anti Revolution Guard, leaving Kreya to step up and follow in her brother's revolutionary footsteps. However, due to the betrayal of her men, Kreya was nearly killed by the Empire. The desperate Kreya was saved by Yang Che by chance. And after learning about Yang Che's thoughts, Kreya firmly believes that Yang Che should not become an assassin, but a revolutionary to change this country.

Heya Tilmat:

An imperial researcher from an officer's family, the inventor of the heavy machine gun, the weapon that changed this war. Desiring to use this war to help her father return from the battlefield as soon as possible, she didn't realize that this machine gun became the murderer of her father, and since then she has been plunged into endless grief and self-reproach. However, her encounter with Yang Che in the college gradually brings her out of the haze and she begins to try to pursue the ideal she buried deep in her heart.

content_descriptors.notes: Although this work had sexual intercourse with the female protagonist after establishing a romantic relationship, according to the relevant laws and regulations of the author's country, the process of implementing specific actions was omitted, so there is no real HCG. Of course, some CG or vertical drawings may be exposed more.
